10) I post these Tweets in honor of my dad. He would say - debate Hannity and beat him with facts. Disagree without being disagreeable.
9 These principles apply to unpopular speakers tok. We must protect free speech when it is most difficult to do so
8)  He taught me that during the McCarthy era when First Amendment under attack...and would want me to defend Hannity's right to be wrong
7)  My dad taught me that the ACLU stood for the protection for all free expression under he First Amendment.  And he was a proud member.
6)  I would say the same if it were conservatives doing the same regarding Stephen Colbert Show advertisers.
5) I respectfully do not agree with economic boycotts or any listing of advertisers inviting retribution for speech.
4)  But I strongly believe in the First Amendment
column4: the right to speak and free expression and no penalties for content of speech
